list.name: Changes
list.comment: Almost every clientApp function is working, however, there are no sockets being used. The readDishes method was added, because sending the information via sockets didn't work. The confirmSelection method was added, it changes the detailsLabel to display the details of the selected dish. The addDish method was added, it lets the user add the selected dish to a PreOrderQueue. The addOrder method was added, it takes the PreOrderQueue and transfers its elements to the OrderQueue. The startPreparation Timer and startOrderProcessing methods were added, their main function is to take the preparation time of the first element of the OrderQueue and wait until it finishes to dequeue it, and then it proceeds to the next dish. The ArduinoController and the sendNumberToArduino methods were added, but, they're still a work in progress.

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment: Added the methods dishesAVL, addDish, processInput to the serverMain class, also made some changes to the sockets, for the adminMain class, added the sendData methods, and for the masterController class, added the addDishBtn method. Finally, made some changes to the MasterApp FXML file to include some requirements.

task.summary: Added the delete method to the AVLTree, and the findMin method. Made some changes to existing methods. Added the processData method and the receiveData method to the adminMain class. Added an editDish, deleteDish, updateChoiceBox, and a setChoiceBox method, but they're not working properly or incomplete.

Almost every clientApp function is working, however, there are no sockets being used. The readDishes method was added, because sending the information via sockets didn't work. The confirmSelection method was added, it changes the detailsLabel to display the details of the selected dish. The addDish method was added, it lets the user add the selected dish to a PreOrderQueue. The addOrder method was added, it takes the PreOrderQueue and transfers its elements to the OrderQueue. The startPreparation Timer and startOrderProcessing methods were added, their main function is to take the preparation time of the first element of the OrderQueue and wait until it finishes to dequeue it, and then it proceeds to the next dish. The ArduinoController and the sendNumberToArduino methods were added, but, they're still a work in progress.
